resNameAdd:
1) Md. Rohijuddin Ali
    Advocate - Amrit Boro, Matiur Rahman

business_details.Business: Accused is produced from jail. send him back to jail. copy furnished to accused.

the accused Rahijuddin Ali is produced from the jail. Ld. counsel for the accused is present. heard both side on the pint of charge against the accused. having found prima-faice, the charge u.s 8 pocso is farmed against the accused. seen the bail petition of the accused filed by Khairul Islam stating that the charge-sheet has been filed in the case and the accused already spent more than 2 months in jail. the accused may be given chance to take the proper defense in the trial. heard Ld. Counsel for the both sides and perused the record. accordingly the accused is allowed to go on bail for r.s 10,000/- with a surety of like amount with condition that he shall appear regularly in the court without any default. issue summons to the p.ws
Accused presentpw absent&#039issue summon to pws
Accused presentpw absentissue summon to pws

C/R is received on transfer for disposal.This court is designated as Special Court vide Gauhati High Court, Guwahati notification dated 02-01-2020.Accused Rahijuddin is present.Perused C/R.Today is fixed for evidence.2 Pws are present.Seen petition No. 267/2020 filed by petitioner Hiralal Saha praying for condoning the absence of the victim girl on the ground of her examination.Heard. Allowed.Also seen petition No. 268/2020 filed by ld. Counsel for the petitioner praying for adjournment on the ground of ailment of engaged counsel.Heard. Considering the cause shown and also taking note that Pws have come a long way from Tamulpur to depose, in the interest of fair trial, prayer for adjournment is allowed subject to payment of cost of Rs. 500/- (Rs. Five Hundred only) to each PW present today. Receipt of payment of cost be acknowledged. B/A to take steps.Pws are allowed to go. They are to remain present on the next fixed date. Victim also to remain present. No further summons will be issued.
Accused Rahijuddin is present.3 PWs including victim are present.Perused C/R.All the 3 PWs are examined and cross examined.Issue summons to remaining PWs.
